a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTMumps (IMMZ.D2.DT.Mumps) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a mumps vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: 2-dose schedule (countries with mumps in schedule and low transmission of measles) * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTMumps

def.name: Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 1

expression.name: Client's age is less than 12 months

def.name: Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 2

a:s.a:s: "No mumps primary series doses were administered"
"Client's age is more than or equal to 12 months"
"Live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks"

Client's age is more than or equal to 12 months
Live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks

def.name: Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 3

a:s.a:s: "One mumps primary series dose was administered"
"The latest mumps dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago"

The latest mumps dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago

a:s.a:s: "One mumps primary series dose was administered"
"The latest mumps dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago"

def.name: Client is not due for mumps vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client for first mumps dose as client\'s age is less than 12 months. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first dose.'
"Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client for first mumps dose as live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first dose.'
"Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client for second mumps dose as latest mumps dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.'
"Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 4"

'Should not vaccinate client for second mumps dose as live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.'

when.name: Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should not vaccinate client for first mumps dose as client's age is less than 12 months. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first dose.

when.name: Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 2

then.value: Should not vaccinate client for first mumps dose as live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first dose.

when.name: Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 3

then.value: Should not vaccinate client for second mumps dose as latest mumps dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.

when.name: Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 4

then.value: Should not vaccinate client for second mumps dose as live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.

def.name: Client is due for mumps vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for mumps vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client for first mumps dose as the client is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for contraindications. '
"Client is due for mumps vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client for second mumps dose as latest mumps dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago and no live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.'

when.name: Client is due for mumps vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should vaccinate client for first mumps dose as the client is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.

when.name: Client is due for mumps vaccination Case 2

then.value: Should vaccinate client for second mumps dose as latest mumps dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago and no live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.

a:s.a:s: "Two mumps primary series doses were administered"

expression.name: Two mumps primary series doses were administered
